body_html:
I found the following section really helpful: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim#evaluation-loop

I initially thought the main slim page was:
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim

I created a PR to make this more explicit here:
tensorflow/models#2371
body_text:
I found the following section really helpful: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim#evaluation-loop

body:
I found the following section really helpful: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim#evaluation-loop

I initially thought the main slim page was:
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim

I created a PR to make this more explicit here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/pull/2371
